lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: small, local businesses are a key component of strengthen our communities and alleviating poverty in a sustainable manner.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment, I attend university. My major is in Communications and Sustainable Community Development.

lender.name: Gaurav Hemrajani
lender.loan_because: I can. Also, I believe that Microfinance is one of the most effective methods out there for Poverty alleviation in developing countries.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.occupational_info: I dive off of cliffs inside a mexican restaurant, to entertain people.

lender.name: Valentina
lender.loan_because: Important to give people chances to help create choices...
lender.occupational_info: Learning....

lender.name: Braun-Covarrubias Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people as a family :)

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: when times were hard, there were people in my life that helped me get back on my feet with small loans. I consider it a duty and an obligation to continue the good will given to me by passing it on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm attending college here in the States with the goal of becoming an archaeologist. I enjoy learning about the origins of humans and how people made a living thousands of years ago.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I get to make a positive difference in someone's life and also help people help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference. I have been to Nakuru, in Kenya I know because I have seen and experienced how little can make such huge changes to a persons life. The gift of a few dollars can save a life, give encouragement, give back pride and self asteem and give back so much that we take for granted.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I'd like to think I can do something to help. I see to much waste at home.
lender.occupational_info: Pointless. I watch people throw money away.

lender.name: Marianne and Fraser
lender.loan_because: We are so grateful to finally have a resource that provides our family the opportunity to effectively help people from all over the world to achieve their ambitions. Thanks Kiva for giving low income people from all over the world a voice, and asking them, instead of telling them, what they need. Thanks for giving us this amazing opportunity to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Marianne works in the community helping people access the resources that they need. Fraser is a carpenter who builds houses. Angela is in university to study anthropology (the study of cultures). Jessica is also in university and works at a shelter for homeless youth.

lender.name: Robert Shepherd
lender.loan_because: eveybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at a university that is using plants to produce cheaper, safer vaccines. I hope that one day our work will enable people around the globe to access health technologies that will positively affect their and their families quality of life, and in-turn, their ability to prosper.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Omnes mundum facimus - We all make the world.

lender.name: Ato
lender.occupational_info: I act in movies, theater and television.

lender.name: jos
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to start there business
lender.occupational_info: I am an Chocolatier and work on a oldfashion way, So i have there best ingredients and don't work for the money

lender.name: Igal Sapir
lender.loan_because: I can and they need it to change their lives
lender.occupational_info: Math Teacher

lender.name: Wael
lender.loan_because: I know that the loan will make a differnace in someone's life, and will help them make a living out of it.
lender.occupational_info: Managing a Small loans to the most needy farmers.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: To give without any reward, or any notice, has a special quality of its own. No better feeling in the world

lender.name: Brittany
lender.occupational_info: I sell books.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can. Such a little amount to me here in the UK can make such a massive difference elsewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in communications and events for a London community group aimed at Social Inclusion

lender.name: Audrey, Bryan, Nic
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy homes in Austin, TX.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help other people improve their lives.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I would like others to have the same opportunities that others have graciously afforded me.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide computer support for a plastic and cast iron pipe manufacturer.

lender.name: TheTelf
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves seems like the only way we're ever going to get any closer to a fair, just, self-sustaining world.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that helps to improve hospital services.

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: I believe, together we can make a difference in the lives of many families. Jesus said..."If you can believe, all things are possible to him who believes." Mark 9:23
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations earn money that they can use for any purpose.

lender.name: Koenig
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I provide full time security at my home. My human works in heavy engineering.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: PAUL & JUDY
lender.loan_because: i) being lucky enough to be able to make loans and ii) I enjoy the way Kiva work and the help they bring to many entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Finance Director of a sliced bread making plant employing 65 people and producing about 20 million loaves of bread a year. Based in Andalucia, Southern Spain

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to feel that I make a difference for those who are seeking a better way of life. Everyone should be given a chance to succeed, no matter what his/her socioeconomic status.
lender.occupational_info: I am trained to be a librarian in the school system (grades Kindergarten through 12th). I currently work in my church nursery while I stay at home with my 3 year old son.

lender.name: Francisco
lender.loan_because:
maybe i don¬¥t need it all.
maybe i don¬¥t need it at all.

lender.name: Della
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed in this country and need to extend our blessings to others in places where change is necessary and people are motivated in those countries to step up to the challenge.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: you need to give back to others.
lender.occupational_info: Real estate agent in Los Angeles area.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: there are people all over the world who aren't as fortunate as I am. I help simply because I can =)

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: it's powerful and fulfilling for everyone involved.
lender.occupational_info: stressful and rewarding

lender.name: Drury Gives Global
lender.loan_because: We are business students that want to help entrepreneurs around the world to improve their business and their communities.¬† We started this fund with support from many people at our University.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change we need to see in the world

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: it's an excellent way of giving back. Empowering individuals to be the best that they can be is a rewarding experience.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: I create art to help people learn. I illustrate concepts and ideas to help teach students about everything from science & health to marketing & good business practices.

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: I prefer people learn to support themselves through business loans rather than from free handouts.

lender.name: E.J.
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur myself. Plus, I believe we are all part of one global family and this helps me to feel more connected to that family.

lender.name: MONIQUE
lender.loan_because: it is important to help one another. We are blessed to bless others...

lender.name: Buddy
lender.loan_because: These loans were made by the students and professors in the Spring 2008 Semester Honors Principles of Marketing class at the University of Louisville. The class was divided into 5 teams of students and each team selected a specific entrepreneur for a loan. As these loans are repaid, the funds will be used to make additional loans by students taking this class in the future.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about social justice and I feel like Kiva is an excellent way to reach out and make an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently teaching English in Sapporo, Japan. After I leave here I plan to attend graduate school and continue my studies in the field of international relations.

lender.name: April and Joe
lender.occupation: Mortgage Broker and Grade School Studen

lender.name: Raphael
lender.loan_because: I am a hedonist and it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to paint their truest pictures.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky in Canada, so I want to help others to elevate my good karma
lender.occupational_info: school for now...

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: In support of the United Nations Millenium Development Goals
lender.occupational_info: I taught at university when I was younger.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to improve living conditions in Latin America...one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in Communications for the world's largest Ice Cream and Nutrition company.
The guilt I feel from the ice cream is offset by the work we do on Nutrition. It's a balancing act. :)

lender.name: Cathryn and Lenord
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that if we all do a little, a lot can be accomplished.
lender.occupational_info: I work with First Nations communities to improve their access to Health services and information.

lender.name: Ush
lender.loan_because: Its time to lend a hand

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Grace
lender.occupational_info: I work for the State of California. I write contracts that help keep our air clean and breathable.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to (hopefully) make a big difference in someone's life. I joined the Japan lending group because I used to teach in Miyagi prefecture.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to high school students.

lender.name: DealKarma
lender.loan_because: Microlending is one of the best ways to start addressing the unequal distribution of resources in the world.
lender.occupational_info: DealKarma is a radical experiment in social entrepreneurism. We are a group buying website that donates 10-50% of our profits to great organizations like Kiva.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Bill and Coralee
lender.loan_because: no amount of fine feeling can take the place of faithful doing.
lender.occupational_info: Coralee is an artist and teaches in the public schools. Bill is a writer for Native American Natural Resources.

lender.name: Arielle
lender.loan_because: I want other women to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Sometimes fun, sometimes boring, very detail oriented.

lender.name: Alarico
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Tanzania, East Africa. I am of a fortunate few that got to go to college and now lives in the U.S. I miss Africa, I love Africa. I loan because I want to give something back.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a student with two focuses: Global Security (conflict analysis & Resolution) Economics (Development Economics & International Economics)
I am the supervisor of the Planning Division of Maintenance & Engineering at Midwest Airlines.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I have had so many advantages in my life; I just want to share with others.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people around the world get closer to their dreams and there are so many great stories.
lender.occupational_info: I create livable spaces for people to live and work in.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Authentic Jobs
lender.loan_because: We offer job opportunities for individuals throughout the world, so we figure it's only fitting to donate 1% of our total revenue to help entrepreneurs throughout the world.

lender.name: Botterill Family
lender.loan_because:
We like to help people.
Most of these people are hard working who just need a break to get their business going.
lender.occupational_info:
We are a family of five living in Calgary, Alberta, Canada
Some of the charities we assist are www.kiva.org www.samaritanspurse.ca. www.innfromthecold.org www.worldvision.ca

lender.name: M Sotherden
lender.loan_because: I own my own stained glass studio, and I am able to be in business because I had help from a lot of people. Kiva is my way of "paying it forward" to other people trying to live their entrepreneurial dream.
lender.occupational_info: I make glass art (like the barrette in my photo) to sell to people all over the world.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed in my life to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the people that run our businesses.

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: I won a KIVA gift card...pretty sweet
lender.occupational_info: I'm a biology/environmental science major, and I plan to pursue soil science, soil conservation, soil chemistry, something with soil

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I like the transparency of Kiva. I like knowing who my money goes to and what's being used for, rather than just throwing money at a charity and never knowing what will come of it.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think everyone has the ability to change the world in some capacity.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Babson College, the country's top school for Entrepreneurship. I am also helping Mission Schools International open its first two schools in Rwanda.

lender.name: Alisa
lender.loan_because: "He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the Lord require of you? To act JUSTLY and to love MERCY and to walk HUMBLY with your God." Micah 6:8
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to live a healthier life and I coach soccer and track.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupational_info: Educating my community about the world, its people, its culture, its politics.

lender.name: Eric & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: something small to us can mean the world to others.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm anonymously helping someone.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: it amazes me how little can help another so much :-)
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and property.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are working hard to promote their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students at a Catholic High school in Orange County, California

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Inequality is immoral, and makes the world unsafe for everyone.

lender.name: bernie
lender.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way

lender.name: Deanne
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have the help and support I have needed throughout life to live well, dream big and to pursue my goals. Every person on earth deserves the same; and I believe each of us can be an earth guardian angel to persons everywhere. We can all extend ourselves in some small way to be the break , the hope, that someone somewhere needs to make their life better and to pursue their dreams. Every good deed makes the world greater. This organization is a prime example of the reality and the innate goodness of that movement. Bravo Kiva.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Helping people, in big ways or small, puts a smile on my face and makes the world a better place.

lender.name: K. Marcus
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving that is not "charity" nor promotes dependency. Lending does not foster dependency but rather fosters independence, interdependence and hard work. This builds pride and self-esteem.
lender.occupational_info: I attempt to be of service to people by listening and bearing witness to their suffering. We discuss their problems and work toward solutions. I encourage strength, self-sufficiency and community. I feel very honored to be able to do this type of work.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because:
I am a truly blessed person, I have the kind of life where I have so much..... I am surrounded by LOVE in many forms...
I want to help others who are trying to move from the place they are in right now and move towards a more sustainable lifestyle.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: hmmm, night out or change a life for the better... damn that was easy to answer
lender.occupational_info: i am paid to give people money all day long, and now i do it here for fun

lender.name: Charlie Sherrod
lender.loan_because: if I can help seed someone's dreams for a better life, what better use of my resources?
lender.occupational_info: I make things! I develop new ideas that make a difference in the marketplace.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: prosperity and success can help people free themselves from the bondage of myth and superstition.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: If I can help others, I will.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Mayor of Orange County, Florida focusing on political and environmental issues. The home of Disney World.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I am strong believer in microfinance, especially for women in developing countries, and I am fortunate enough to be able to spare the money at this time. It is immensely satisfying to know that I am able to have such a direct, significant impact on people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit organization that encourages tourists to visit my community, and supports cultural and recreational activities for tourists to enjoy when they visit.

lender.name: Jerry & Sue
lender.loan_because: "For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also." Gospel of Matthew 6:21

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: It is a biblical principle to loan without interest and I know it is very beneficial to the reciever
lender.occupational_info: study of art on the computers (graphic design)

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: Its always nice to have a helping hand. Just passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: I clean, feed, and take care of lots of animals at a zoo in Texas! I love my job!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Trisha
lender.loan_because: I believe by helping others you also help yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of other peoples children while the parents work.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: We are all connected. I believe it is possible to make a difference as an individual, a little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an Art School with students who are trying to work in the field of Animation and Visual Effects.

lender.name: rocco, isabelle & simon
lender.loan_because: we wish that everyone in this world gets the same chance for a good life. Further we hope that every child will profit from this project, having the probability of enough to eat an education.
lender.occupational_info: simon is an artist, works with earth, wood, trash etc. isabelle is a restorer of furniture and objects made of wood

lender.name: Mitesh
lender.loan_because: a mere $25 could make a world of difference to a budding entrepreneur in a less privileged nation
lender.occupational_info: Create wealth by sharing it

lender.name: chang
lender.loan_because: for
lender.occupational_info: reason

lender.name: Debraj&Sayantani
lender.loan_because: We believe we can always take a little bit of comfort from our lives in order to help those who need it most and make a difference in this world. That makes life truly worth living

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: I like the idea, I think it is a good way to help people to help themselves

lender.name: Haggai Borkow
lender.loan_because: "Since Auschwitz we know what man is capable of. And since Hiroshima we know what is at stake. It is an exquisite joy to do what we can!"
lender.occupational_info: Making others doubt the obvious. Or is it?

lender.name: Matt D.
lender.loan_because: Someone gave me a gift on Kiva. I hope to loan more when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer to teach English to Chinese students.

lender.name: Christofer
lender.loan_because: I beleeve that we only help, if we help the people produce products they can afford and use in the countries they live in. With my small loan I hope to make life of some people a little better.

lender.name: THE One Office
lender.loan_because: We want to help Change the World together with people like you & really make the World a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We have recently started our own foundation where by we will build schools in remote villages in developing third world countries. From these schools we will hopefully build good communities around them & give the inhabitants & their dependants an opportunity to gain an education & help them develope themselves in readiness for the future.

lender.name: Frank and Susan
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: Just enjoying retirement and spending time with family!

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with a great job and want to give others the opportunity to enjoy success and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: My company offers financing/leasing to businesses so they can just pay a monthly payment without ownership. This is allows companies to have the latest equipment without having to buy it again, they just continue making a monthly payment. I also create special offers (promotions) and new financial products.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have everything I'd ever need and through travelling, I've seen how giving a little can help someone get that extra step up in life and have more hope for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail for a big box retailer selling electrical equipment. I am responsible for marketing of specifiic items both in-store and out of home.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I think you define yourself via your acts and not by your words. I loan to others because if the roles were reversed I would hope someone would lend to me. I loan because it feels great. I loan because I think it is an effective way to help others. I loan because people need the money.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people do their jobs better.

lender.name: Donna
lender.occupational_info: I am an archaeologist who studies the use of the past in modern politics and political movements in South America

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: My family in Spain were'nt as privileged as we are here in the states. If i can give someone a helping hand to feed a family or make a community better then i will.
lender.occupational_info:
I do not make a lot but enough to make myself comfortable. I work in sales. I sell contracts to Hospitals and physician groups that we will do their billing for them.
outsourced accounts recievables

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It's a darn cool thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I consult on income and property taxes.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: it's not charity. No one wants "charity", they want to earn with dignity. Kiva gives them the initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of psychology and also very involved in a community service organization.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe that women need to be empowered to provide a better life for their children and for themselves. I couldn't have started my business without help and I want to pass along the gift to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing to find out how to better sell products to people.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is important to know you can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I clean the water.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Quentin
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help people and share the blessings I've been given.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who support, setup, and fix PCs.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: It is so rewarding to help someone achieve their goals.

lender.name: ARTICULATE
lender.loan_because: What an awesome opportunity to give others opportunities!
lender.occupational_info: We make really cool e-learning software that anyone can use.

lender.name: Dona
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I build, furnish, stock and staff new medical offices for physicians and hospitals.

lender.name: Juliana
lender.loan_because: i realise how privileged i am, and how a small sum in my world can make a huge difference in someone else's.
lender.occupational_info: i founded and run my own company, which is a website for classical music.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is a privilege to be able to help our neighbors.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I like that Kiva is a help-out rather than a hand-out. I like that my money is going to be repaid, so I can help lots of people with the same initial investment. I also like that I can hand pick who I invest in and feel that connection with that individual. I can see exactly where my money is going and have a face to match exactly who I'm lending a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I run an upscale wine and liquor store and play bass guitar.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I belive in helping those who help themselves. Together we can rid the world of povery.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Computers

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: Help has been there when I have needed it in the past
lender.occupational_info: Special needs dog rescuer. I foster deaf bull dogs until they can find a forever home

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand how small loans can empower people and dramatically improve their lives!

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I think it is very easy to forget how lucky you are and how difficult life can be for others. Luckily I am in a position to help out in my own way to enable a few people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Business outsourcing.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I care about the global community, and believe we have a social responsibility to assist other individuals where possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student at the University of Oklahoma and will be a Doctor in 2013...

lender.name: Carl & Nachele
lender.loan_because: Blessing others is one of the biggest blessing of all.

lender.name: Maria Ang√©lica
lender.loan_because: I will want support my family with money of my work. I believe on my qualities for this. I just need of a chance. With the money, we'll do a little restaurant, buy more things to cook.
lender.occupational_info: My daughter, me and my father-in-law do candys, cakes, lunch, typical food and many other foods.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful opportunity to help people establish financial independence and foster autonomy
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor specializing in pathology.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I feel it's important to give back to communities in need. When I visited Peru in 2007, I learned first hand the struggles that many people faced and this is my small way of helping.
lender.occupational_info: By providing an enterprise collaboration platform and web conferencing software, I assist companies improve their productivity amongst their colleagues, partners and customers.

lender.name: The Snowman
lender.loan_because: I am privileged enough to be able to lend money.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: it is a proven way to help someone improve their quality of life. It's good to foster the entrepreneurial spirit!
lender.occupational_info: I have spent 25+ years in the banking industry doing a variety of things, but mostly managing all things relating to marketing communications.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: It is a simple and effective way to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have emotional and behavior disabilites.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because:
The borrowers are offering useful goods and services to their communities. I'm impressed by how resourceful they are in environments that are much more difficult than any I've had to deal with.
And yet, with each person, there is usually something about their business, their aspirations, their family or their circumstances that is like my own or like someone I know here. These glimpses make the world seem smaller and friendlier.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to bring more peace to the world
lender.occupational_info: health care

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping entrepreneurs in developing areas.
lender.occupational_info: I extend credit to businesses

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about doing something to change the world. Helping others help themselves seems like the best way to do so.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone help themselves through hard work
lender.occupational_info: I print magazines

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help others less fortunate than yourself. I like Kiva because it gives people the means to help themselves and not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair avionic systems for the US Air Force.

lender.name: Jesse Krembs
lender.loan_because: because this is one of the best ways to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology, computers, radios and other hackers to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Tera Eng Dalla
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and help my native country of Cambodia.
lender.occupational_info: I am a facilitative leader and I bring people together to solve complex business problems and/or plan for anticipated market demands.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help my fellow business person get going with their businesses, it makes me feel happy.
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites on the Internet for companies in the United States of America.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe we can make the world into a better place one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Full-time freshmen college student.

lender.name: Solo Travel Network
lender.loan_because: Supporting individual initiative is a step-by-step pathway to equality for every citizen of our global community.
lender.occupational_info: International networking among people who travel without a partner.

lender.name: Nina
lender.occupational_info: advertising for pharmaceuticals

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families and realize their dreams.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to give back to those who are trying hard to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after working 15 years. I raised 5 children who are all living on their own and having families. I spend my time exploring my country from our RV. We volunteer with Habitat, building houses.

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: I think that the work Kiva does in forging relationships all over the world to help those in need, those that otherwise might not have the access to resources they need.

lender.name: daniel
lender.loan_because: i believe in freedom ,happiness and abundance of good . if all of us would do what ever we can to help others, even if it small things that we not really thinking that can change something , the world will be a better place for all of us with freedom, happiness and abundance.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel so good to do this - such a small amount to me, but it means so much to these entrepreneurs who are just trying to support their families.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: Lending lets me have a positive contact with people who are different from me.
lender.occupational_info: I am what's called a "water lawyer" in the Western United States. I represent the federal government in lawsuits to sort out who has rights to drill wells and irrigate from streams in desert areas.

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I believe that people who have a true desire will make things happen. Even with uncertain circumstances people are capable of creating miracles in their lives. Lets help miracles happen.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I want to help, although I wish I could do more, this is a start. Hopefully I will be able to contribute more in the future financially, or by recruiting other lenders.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a factory where I assemble automobiles.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I want to help people but in a way that is empowering to them and that will have a long-term impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am the assistant to my company's CEO - I type documents, arrange his travel, organize meetings, and generally make his life easier.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to several of the countries covered by Kiva. It was amazing to meet people like this who are working so hard to build businesses and support their families in such difficult conditions. I want to do whatever I can to provide them opportunity to expand.
lender.occupational_info: As a marketing professional, I shape how and to whom we sell our products as well as what the products need to be. My work involves selling operational software to large enterprises (like credit card companies, utilities, and health care insurers).

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in a sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to appreciate and learn about the land and themselves by helping them to experience the wilderness.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I loan because of Moopups. He was a loner who quietly changed many lives, without even knowing he was doing so. If he were still here, he would be making loans through Kiva. Since he is not here, I loan in his memory.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I needed help for education and raise my children and I want to show my gratitude to those who helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies understand and report their taxes to the government.

lender.name: Marte
lender.loan_because: it is is practical way to partner with women all around the world and to empower families and communities through these bold women.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: Makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info: Provide people with a vision of financial independence.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: compared to some, work is not an appropriate description.

lender.name: Annabelle and Daniel
lender.loan_because: we are lucky to have all of the things that we have, and there are a lot of people out there who need this money more than we do.
lender.occupational_info: We are both full time college students.

lender.name: Rosena
lender.loan_because: a small amount can make such a huge difference!

lender.name: Asko
lender.loan_because: Even the little I give may be someone's big break.
lender.occupational_info: I help people access their government through the internet.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: it's important to give back to our world economy. I believe everyone should be able to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I sell men's jewelry and accessories to people all over the world.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: I have seen how much impact a small amount of money can make - and the structure of Kiva makes it more likely the money will be used appropriately by the entrepreneur. I travel often to Uganda and may be able to meet some of the entrepreneurs I'm lending to... and I'm especially keen to support women who often are left with the responsibility for raising the children when husbands die or otherwise leave the family.
lender.occupational_info: I do public health research on HIV/AIDS in Africa, mostly Uganda.

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I help determine the right price to charge for insurance.

lender.name: ThomasEconClasses
lender.occupational_info: We are students. We seek to understand how the world economy works. We also wish to participate in this economy. We do so here, as mini-venture capitalists.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: "This is how we know what love is. Jesus Christ laid down his life for us, and so we should lay down our lives for our brothers" 1 John 3:16.

lender.name: xiaobo
lender.loan_because: no pain,no gain. Many peoples need some help for the sake of alleviating poverty. So I think I shall doing someting.
lender.occupational_info: business of communicate instrument

lender.name: Bijan
lender.loan_because: I personally know the reality of development aid and have been to some of the countries I lend to. Kiva is the most effective way to give.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager in Development Aid, specialising in knowledge management and ICT4Dev.

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupation: Office Manager for a small non-profit
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I do the paperwork for a volunteer organization that teaches people outdoor recreation skills.

lender.name: Yudi
lender.loan_because: I want plant jackbean for 20 ha land

lender.name: Tessie & Philip
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people who need microloans
lender.occupational_info: I teach ethics

lender.name: Karim
lender.loan_because: if I was one of the people asking for a loan, I would be happy to have some people trusting me and helping me out.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I know I can change peoples lives without even spending money. I am just that cool!!!

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: i believe that individuals should help.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help themselves. This is a very personal and tangible way of supporting small scale enterprises and developments that can have a direct impact on the wellbeing of the families involved.
lender.occupational_info: I am a midwife and a nurse. I worked in the NHS for 35 years and have just started my own consultancy. I understand the struggle of starting a new business, but in England there is lots of support available. This is my way of supporting those in more difficult economies to also realise their ambitions.

lender.name: Achim
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good idea and I hope it changes some lives for the better

lender.name: jan
lender.loan_because: Splendid idea
lender.occupational_info: IT development

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because:
We as human beings are the ones on this earth responsible for creating and manifesting everything that is going on in our world today! There is and there can be enough for everyone - no one deserves or should go through difficult times, for we as human beings are responsible for allowing the humanitarian problems in the world to still continue. Corrupt systems, that keeps us humans enslaved....sick, hungry for power & money, while the real problems/issues are being ignored. We have to stop and stand up/ change our ways - as within, so without - re-create a better world for all humans/ children and start taking responsibility for ourselves and for our world!
‚ÄúIn a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of! In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of!‚Äù ~Confucius~
A leader is best when people barely know he exists, not so good when people obey and acclaim him, worse when they despise him....But of a good leader who talks little when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say, "We did it ourselves. ~Lao Tzu~

lender.name: Alexis Lauzon
lender.loan_because: This may be the only process that can support entrepreneurs in these countries to bring a new change in their business and life.
lender.occupational_info: "The good times of today are the sad thoughts of tomorrow"- bob marley

lender.name: Muhammad Atif Ali
lender.loan_because: I have a business trading in commuditities.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: Allah has blessed me and i want to share with those less fortunate.

lender.name: Martin Scott
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I am able to enjoy a good income. It is important for me to help others achieve a better standard of living along with education for themselves and for their children. Lending through Kiva seems to be to be a great way to work toward that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I help write computer programs that allow companies to display information in the Internet.

lender.name: Elizabeth H. Ojai, CA
lender.loan_because: My children gave me $50 to loan for my 50th birthday, I wanted to loan to someone with children. I will continue loaning with Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I develop office product for an online store for my employer. For a hobby I have a big garden, chickens, rabbits and dogs.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: There is not enough compassion and camaraderie in the world. We're all part of one great community, and I love that Kiva offers me an opportunity to reach out to people across the globe in making a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info:
I help people with stress and trauma related conditions including insomnia. I have specialized training in a naturalistic stress and trauma healing method called Somatic Experiencing. This is a body centered way of gently releasing tension and stress. For sleep issues I work with individuals over a series of one-on-one sessions based on cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia, CBT-I. Sometimes I offer classes for general information on sleep and stress relief.
I am in Waldorf Early Childhood education in hopes of bringing my skills to youngsters and thier families.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: Everything I have came from someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs and sell them to businesses.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: I really want to try and save some money over the next few years and while i'm saving, I like to think it really helps someone else in the world, So thanks for helping me.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to build houses

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I have 25% North Vietnamese heritage, 75% French, born in France in 1944, now living in the Pocono mountains of Pennsylvania, USA. I want to participate in lifestyle improvement for those still living where my grandmother came from.

lender.name: Samantha & Scott
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Small Business Development

lender.name: Paul Fairley
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to empower the economic independence of women in the developing world.

lender.name: A.J. Smith
lender.loan_because: I believe grass roots, individual-to-individual, economic solutions are likely far superior to major, sweeping programs administered by large organizations. What a wonderful way to participate in changing lives through microcredit.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Chadron
lender.loan_because: we are a philanthropic club always looking for a way to serve above self.
lender.occupational_info: Rotary Club is an international business club made of members who want to serve above themselves.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I can. I want my children to understand the importance of giving to others everytime they can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish language and culture at the college level.

lender.name: LG
lender.loan_because: I want to help people helping themselves. When these entrepreneurs have repaid their loans I can let someone else use the money! In this way more people can be helped to raise themselves out of poverty to a better life.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: It's my way to give back...
lender.occupational_info: I try to create music and share it with the world.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to support the little guy. He is the one that makes the world turn.
lender.occupational_info: I create indoor comfort

lender.name: EPO TH 13th floor
lender.loan_because: We believe in this way of helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: We promote prosperity across Europe, and thanks to Kiva now also beyond...

lender.name: Mulder Family
lender.occupational_info: Chad works as a marketer. Jodi is a part-time clinical social worker. Levi plays & sings. Judah is learning how to walk.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs succeed.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want an investment that helps the world to be a better place
lender.occupational_info: Texile manufacturing - management

lender.name: Farzad
lender.loan_because: I do this on behalf of my new baby boy. In a few years when my son is old enough to understand I want to use Kiva to teach him about helping others.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I care, and because it hurts to see the chasm between the way we live and the way people in developing countries are forced to live.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work for money any more. I had a computer software and consultancy company that I sold to some mad Americans who paid me enough money I don't need to work for a living any more. So I went back to University and am now researching a Ph.D.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: I have a very blessed life and want to share some of my good fortune to others who otherwise would not get the chance to succeed. Everyone deserves a chance to be happy and feel worthy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a CAT scan technologist. I take specialized x-rays of people. My work keeps me grounded because everyday I see people who are very sick and still stay upbeat about life. How could I not feel fortunate and blessed?

lender.name: liquid
lender.loan_because: money's just another word for nothing left to lose

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: It's my need to support, especially people in Africa.

lender.name: adriana
lender.loan_because: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, "What are you doing for others?"- Martin Luther King, Jr.
lender.occupational_info: Shaping the lives of young children.

lender.name: simi
lender.loan_because: its simple... I CAN...

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Publisher of printed editions of classical choral, vocal, and keyboard music

lender.name: Maranda
lender.occupational_info: I go to Brevard College in hopes of becoming a painter.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to. It's so little money and time, there's no excuse not to!
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student, but my goal is to graduate and work for a non-profit organization - hopefully doing some sort of humanitarian effort/disaster relief.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: We feel it is important to help others. We love the Lord. He commands that we care for the less fortunate. A hand-up is far better than a hand-out!

lender.name: Marcy
lender.loan_because: I want to help anyone who is willing to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I help train people to do their jobs better.

lender.name: Aleara
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help other people.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I believe in redistributing the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I help people turn their good intentions into action, by connecting people, ideas and resources. See idealist.org for more.

lender.name: Fortunate Family
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children and raise them and take care of the house.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.occupational_info: Food writer and founder of nonprofit Drop In & Decorate: Cookies for Donation program.

lender.name: Yolanta
lender.loan_because: it's one of a very few direct options to help people less of....I hope that I can make small diffrence to somebody's life.

lender.name: Murali
lender.loan_because: I want more people in the world to have a better quality of life

lender.name: Neighborhood Book Club
lender.loan_because: we are a book club in New Jersey and we want to do something to make a difference in the world...even if just a bit.
lender.occupational_info: we are a group of mostly mothers in ages ranging from 35 to 50ish and we read and talk about interesting books every month and were hoping to do something bigger than just talk about books.

lender.name: Atterboms
lender.loan_because: this is just an excellent idea!!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to help people improve their lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I review articles that will be published in medical journals.
